featured_projects.name: Learning List - GenAI Alignment Checker
featured_projects.description: GenAI-powered alignment checker tool that improves the educational alignment standard checking process, reducing manual work by 90% and improving turn-around time for EdTech products.
achievements: Automated time-consuming manual alignment checking process
Reduced review time from hours to minutes (90% efficiency gain)
Improved accuracy of educational standard compliance verification
Enhanced EdTech product development workflow

featured_projects.name: Addy AI - HIPAA Compliant AI Platform
featured_projects.description: LLM-based solution to automate U.S. healthcare provider back-office referral workflows. Built a HIPAA-compliant, multi-tenant serverless system with data isolation and rapid tenant onboarding.
achievements: Architected LLM-based solution to automate healthcare referral workflows
Led cross-functional team spanning multiple countries and disciplines
Designed fully serverless AWS architecture enabling near real-time processing
Built HIPAA-compliant multi-tenant serverless system with data isolation

featured_projects.name: GenAI R&D Platform
featured_projects.description: Plug-and-play solution for creating LLM-based chatbots targeting development, enhancing customer interactions. Optimized GenAI product performance by 40% and achieved 50% cost reduction.
achievements: Optimized GenAI product performance by 40%
Achieved 50% cost reduction in GenAI operations
Built scalable RAG-based chatbot framework
Established company's GenAI development services
Created reusable LLM integration patterns

featured_projects.name: Programiz Online Compiler - Infrastructure Modernization
featured_projects.description: Modernized and re-architected the decade-old Programiz.com deployment to achieve high availability, improved reliability, and high observability. Stabilized GKE-based infrastructure for the Online Compiler.
achievements: Stabilized GKE-based infrastructure achieving near-zero downtime
Engineered secure custom sandboxing solution for safer code execution
Reduced infrastructure costs by 50%
Scaled to 10+ compilers serving 150K+ concurrent users and 10M+ monthly users
Partnered with Security team to remediate and mitigate vulnerabilities

featured_projects.name: Evoke Medical Care - Remote Device Monitoring
featured_projects.description: Full suite software solution for remote device monitoring including CIED quarterly checks, HF/fluid monitoring, and RPM data and hardware management.
achievements: Designed scalable medical device monitoring infrastructure
Implemented secure data processing pipelines for medical devices
Ensured regulatory compliance for medical data handling
Built real-time monitoring dashboards for healthcare providers

featured_projects.name: Mindera - Skin Atlas Data Warehouse
featured_projects.description: Comprehensive data warehouse and ETL pipelines for importing data from multiple sources with machine learning algorithm support. Scaled product to handle 500% more data sources (from 8 to 40+ external connections).
achievements: Built comprehensive data warehouse solution
Designed ETL pipelines for multi-source data integration
Scaled data processing to handle 500% more data sources (8 to 40+)
Enabled ML algorithm integration for therapeutic response identification
Implemented hybrid cloud architecture with seamless database integration

featured_projects.name: NxVision - Business Intelligence Platform
featured_projects.description: Data visualization platform that grabs data from all Nurix data sources and provides a single interface to view, manage, and create meaningful reports for tracking Business Milestones.
achievements: Built unified data visualization platform
Integrated multiple data sources into single interface
Enabled business milestone tracking and reporting
Improved deployment frequency by 400% (monthly to weekly)
